import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import'./login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();try{const userDetails={'userName':username,'password':password};var config={method:'post',url:'http://localhost:8044/validateLogin',headers:{"Accept":"/","Content-Type":"application/json"},data:userDetails};const response=await axios(config);navigate("/home");}catch(error){setError(error.response.data.message||"Login failed");}};const handleRegisterClick=()=>{// Get navigate function within component
